title: Teen killed in shooting identified
content:
MERIDIAN – The 15-year-old boy who died after being shot in the head Saturday has been identified as Tristan Fenton, of Meridian, according to the Ada County Coroner's Office.
According to police, David Provencio, 18, of Meridian, was handling one of two handguns in the room, when he pointed the gun, which he thought was unloaded, at the victim's head and pulled the trigger.
Provencio was arrested on suspicion of involuntary manslaughter for the shooting that occurred in the 2300 block of East Franklin Road in Meridian. Police claim Provencio originally said the incident was a suicide.
